price: 68. Alobi: Ya sólo, baye bazali bapaya ba ngai bosala bango mabe te.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
